item.title: Announcing DXMentorship Program
item.description: I'm happy to announce that I've started a mentorship program to help support developers looking to transition into DevRel. I'll be starting with 5 people with the hopes of expanding this number to benefit more people on the long run..."

item.title: Cohort 3 DXMentorship Program
item.description: I'm happy to announce that I've started a mentorship program to help support developers looking to transition into DevRel. I'll be starting with 5 people with the hopes of expanding this number to benefit more people on the long run..."
